description: According to the American Heritage Dictionary, probably from a misreading wook, an English transcription of (the root of) Kannada ಉಕ್ಕು (ukku), ಉರ್ಕು (urku, “steel”); akin to Tamil உருகு (uruku, “to melt”) and உருக்கு (urukku, “melted thing, steel”).

entries.meaning: A famous type of steel from India, much admired for making sword blades.
